Pvz

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pvz.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player holds the information for the user playing the game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Creates a profile that holds kills and sun credits for the user

    • Method Summary
